Module com.github.stephengold.joltjni
Package com.github.stephengold.joltjni

Class CharacterVirtualRefC

java.lang.Object
com.github.stephengold.joltjni.JoltPhysicsObject
com.github.stephengold.joltjni.CharacterVirtualRefC
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConstCharacterBase, ConstCharacterVirtual, ConstJoltPhysicsObject, AutoCloseable, Comparable<JoltPhysicsObject>
public final class CharacterVirtualRefC extends JoltPhysicsObject implements ConstCharacterVirtual
A counted reference to a ConstCharacter. (native type: RefConst<Character>)
